articles.title: Tech Show Paris 2025: Where the Future of Technology Takes Shape
articles.author: ToAI Team
articles.content_text: From 5–6 November 2025, Paris Expo Porte de Versailles will once again become Europe’s beating heart of innovation as it welcomes Tech Show Paris — one of the continent’s most influential gatherings for technology leaders, innovators, and decision-makers. More than just another industry event, Tech Show Paris is where strategies are defined, partnerships are forged, and the next generation of digital transformation begins. A Crossroads for Every Corner of the Tech Ecosystem In a world where IT priorities are evolving faster than ever — from generative AI and post-quantum security to automation and data sovereignty — Tech Show Paris offers […]

articles.title: 7 New Generation ChatGPT Apps You Can Chat With Instantly
articles.author: Arshiya Kunwar
articles.content_text: The next stage of ChatGPT development is characterized by interactivity, connectivity, and extreme power. The new generation ChatGPT apps will finally let individuals use their favorite tools within ChatGPT without having to log into them separately. No matter if you want to prepare a post, make a hotel reservation, gain a new skill, or check out property listings, these ChatGPT-integrated apps allow seamless multitasking. The already impressive ChatGPT ecosystem is transforming into a source of increased productivity, imagination, and user-friendliness. How Apps in ChatGPT Work The apps inside ChatGPT act like communication partners, where users do not have to change […]

articles.title: European Humanoid Robots Summit 2025 is Coming This November 17-18
articles.author: ToAI Team
articles.content_text: The European Humanoid Robots Summit is set to be a pivotal gathering in the field of robotics, attracting over 300 industry representatives from around the globe. With more than 40 exhibitors from various corners of the world showcasing their cutting-edge technologies and products, and 30 top-tier industry experts delivering insightful speeches, this event promises to be a melting pot of innovation and knowledge.  The summit will delve into ‌technological frontiers and innovative breakthroughs‌, ‌product design and commercialization pathways‌, ‌societal impact and ethical governance‌, and ‌future ecosystem development and strategic positioning‌ within Europe’s humanoid robotics industry. Utilizing a hybrid online-offline format, […]

articles.title: Claude Now Connects to Microsoft 365 for Smarter Enterprise Collaboration
articles.author: Abhijay Singh Rawat
articles.content_text: Key Highlights – In a major enterprise productivity shift, Claude has revealed a new collaboration with Microsoft 365 that provides smooth data access throughout the company via the Outlook, Teams, SharePoint, and OneDrive tools. The integration allows Claude to directly bring organizational context into chats, helping professionals reduce the time spent searching for information and instead spend more time making decisions that have an impact. Claude now connects to Microsoft 365. Claude can search for information in SharePoint, OneDrive, Outlook and Teams, providing tailored responses seamlessly. pic.twitter.com/1uutMmcB2j — Anthropic (@AnthropicAI) October 16, 2025 Bringing AI Into Everyday Workflows With the […]

articles.title: Claude Adds New ‘Skills’ Feature Because Everyone Sucks at Repetitive Tasks
articles.author: Chinmay Dhumal
articles.content_text: Key Highlights: Claude has launched a new feature called “Skills” which can used to direct the chatbot to follow a specific set of instructions for all future conversations. It aims to bring more contextual response while preventing an overload of irrelevant information in its general answers. This can also be used to access Claude in niche methods and gain higher accuracy in tasks where a similar pattern is followed. What are Claude Skills? The Skills feature in Claude is like using the chatbot with a Standard Operating Procedure, where you ask it to think in a certain way to achieve […]

articles.title: Meta Unveils New AI-Optimized Data Center in El Paso
articles.author: Arshiya Kunwar
articles.content_text: Key Highlights – Meta has begun the construction of its new AI-optimized data center in El Paso, Texas, which is the 29th one globally and the 3rd one in the state. This facility will be instrumental in providing advanced AI models as Meta builds its infrastructure for products such as smart glasses, AI assistants, live translation, and video editing tools. The company is partnering with The Borderplex Alliance to bring the $1.5 billion project to life. Building for the Future of AI The company has designed the facility for an eventual consumption of 1 GW of power, which will turn […]

articles.title: Anthropic Launches Claude Haiku 4.5 Small Model That Beats GPT-5 in Coding
articles.author: Chinmay Dhumal
articles.content_text: Key highlights: Shortly after releasing the world’s best coding model Sonnet 4.5, Amthropic has now launched Claude Haiku 4.5 small model. It offers similar coding performance as the Sonnet 4, while being faster and cost effective. The new model is rolling out to all users, including free accounts. Claude Haiku 4.5: Everything You Should Know The Claude Haiku 4.5 small model is a direct replacement for Haiku 3.5, and partly Sonnet 4. It is designed for both speed and accuracy, while consuming fewer tokens. It is twice as fast than Sonnet 4, which was previously the best coding model from […]

articles.title: Microsoft Wants Teachers and Students to Use Copilot With These New Learning Tools
articles.author: Chinmay Dhumal
articles.content_text: Key Highlights: Microsoft has announced a major upgrade in Copilot by introducing new learning tools for both teachers and students. Academic institutions will soon be able to use the advanced AI capabilities of Copilot to plan curriculum, create tests and assignments, and other study resources. Students will get access to a new AI agent to help them learn new concepts with reflective thinking, instead of just throwing summaries. New Teaching Tools in Copilot Microsoft is bringing a new Teach feature in Microsoft 365 Copilot where educators can use AI to offer an interactive learning experience to students. Teachers will have […]

articles.title: YouTube Rolls Out New Video Player With Cleaner Design and Interactive Features
articles.author: Arshiya Kunwar
articles.content_text: Key Highlights – YouTube is rolling out a major redesign of its video player globally, introducing a cleaner, more immersive viewing experience starting this week. The update includes new controls, icons, and many quality-of-life improvements aimed at enhancing user engagement, while obscuring less content on screen. Redesigned Video Player Takes Center Stage The new video player is the most important part of the YouTube update. This player has a completely new look, which is modern, and has new, rounded, and slightly transparent buttons on the screen. YouTube says that the new design will “be more pleasing to the eye,” and […]

articles.title: Bahrain Set to Host 13th Edition of MEET ICT Conference and BITEX Exhibition
articles.author: ToAI Team
articles.content_text: The Bahrain Technology Companies Society (BTECH), in strategic partnership with WorkSmart for Events Management, has announced organizing the thirteenth edition of the MEET ICT Conference, to be held in conjunction with the Bahrain International Technology Exhibition (BITEX). The events which a lot of people have been waiting for will be held on November 25-27 at the Gulf Convention Center, Gulf Hotel, Bahrain, including the gathering of world leaders in the information and communication technologies area. The conference and exhibition of this year are going to be hosted with the slogan “Innovation, Transform, Elevate: AI For the New Economy”, which draws […]
